column2: "Na EWURADZE see Josua dɛ
column3: Mma nnsuro
column4: nkyii so mma w'abaw mu mmbu: fa akofo no nyinara ka woho

column2: "Yɛ Ai nye ne hen dɛ mbrɛ eyɛɛ Jeriko nye ne hen no: no mu asadze
column3: nye no mu fiembowa nko
column4: na hom mfa no afonam mma homho: hyɛ ma wɔnkɔ kurow no atsɛwee wɔ n'ekyir."

column2: "Nna Josua
column3: nye akofo no nyinara soɛree
column4: dɛ wɔrokɔfow akɔ Ai: na Josua yiyii mbarimba no mpemeduasa

column2: "Na ɔhyɛɛ hɔn dɛ
column3: Hom nkɔ kurow no atsɛwee
column4: wɔ kurow no n'ekyir: mma hom mmfi kurow no ho nnkɔ ekyirekyir pii

column2: "na emi
column3: nye hɔn a wɔka mo ho nyinara bɔtwe epin kurow no: na ɔbɛba dɛ
column4: sɛ wopue ba hɛn do dɛ asɔpɔn a

column2: "na wobefir edzi etsiw hɛn ekodu dɛ yɛbɔtwe hɔn efi kurow no mu; na wɔbɛse dɛ
column3: Wofi hɛn enyim ruguan
column4: dɛ asɔpɔn no; na sɛ yefi hɔn enyim eguan a
column6: "ɔno hom nsoɛr mfi atsɛwee no mu
column7: na hom nkɛfa kurow no: na EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn dze bɛhyɛ hom nsa."

column2: "Na ɔmbra dɛ
column3: aber a hom afa kurow no
column4: hom nto kurow no mu gya; dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm tse no ara na hom nyɛ: hyɛ

column2: "Na Josua gyaa hɔn kwan: na wɔkɔr atsɛwee no
column3: na wɔtsenaa Bɛtɛl nye Ai ntamu
column4: wɔ Ai n'anee afamu: na Josua dze ɔdaa nseraban no mu anadwe no."

column2: "Na Josua soɛɛr anapaatu
column3: na ɔpoon ɔman no hyiae
column4: na ɔnoara nye Israel mpanyimfo no fowee dzii ɔman no enyim kɔr Ai."

column2: "Na akofo no a wɔka no ho no fowee
column3: na wɔtwee pinii
column4: na wɔbaa kurow no enyim
column5: na wɔkyeer nsera wɔ Ai kwaamu afamu: nna ɔbɔn bi da ɔno nye Ai ntamu."

column2: "Na ɔfaa mbarimba bɛyɛ mpemenum
column3: na ɔdze hɔn kɔr atsɛwee wɔ Bɛtɛl nye Ai ntamu
column4: wɔ kurow no n'anee afamu."

column2: "Na wɔtotoo ɔman no ho hyiae
column3: mekyerɛ dɔm no a wɔwɔ kurow no no kwaamu afamu
column4: na hɔn atsɛweefo no a wɔwɔ kurow no n'anee afamu no nyinara; na Josua kɔr ɔbɔn no mu anadwe no ara."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: aber a Aihen no hunii no
column4: ɔnye ne man nyinara na kurow no mu mbarimba no yɛɛ ntsɛm soɛɛr ahanamakye
column5: fiir edzi dɛ worikehyia Israel nye hɔn ako
column7: wɔ Araba no enyim; nna ɔnodze
column8: onnyim dɛ wɔakɔ no atsɛwee wɔ kurow no ekyir."

column2: "Na Josua nye Israel nyinara yɛɛ dɛ gyama Aimba no etutu hɔn wɔ hɔn enyim
column3: na woguanee faa sar no do kwan no do."

column2: "Na wɔfrɛɛ nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ kurow no mu nyinara bɔɔ mu dɛ wontsiw hɔn: na wotsiiw Josua
column3: na wɔtwee hɔn fii kurow no mu."

column2: "Na ɔbarimba biara annka wɔ Ai anaa Bɛtɛl a oemmpue ennketsiw Israel: na wɔdaan kurow no n'ano gyaa hɔ
column3: na wotsiiw Israel."

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Josua dɛ
column3: Tsen peaa no a ɔdze wo nsamu no wɔ Ai do; na medze mebɛhyɛ wo nsa. Na Josua tseen peaa no a ɔdze ne nsamu no wɔ kurow no do."

column2: "Na atsɛweefo no soɛree fii hɔn ananmu ntsɛm
column3: na ɔtseen ne nsa ara na wotutuu mbirika kɛhɛɛn kurow no mu
column4: na wɔfae; na wɔyɛɛ har too kurow no mu gya."

column2: "Na aber a Ai mbarimba buu hɔn kɔn ekyir no
column3: wohun dɛ
column4: kurow no mu wusiw afow kɔ sor
column5: na woennya ahoɔdzen a wɔdze guan fa ha anaa ha: na nkorɔfo no a woguanee kɔr sar no do no daan hɔnho wɔ hɔn a woritsiw hɔn no do."

column2: "Na aber a Josua nye Israel nyinara hun dɛ atsɛweefo no agye kurow no
column3: na kurow no no wusiw afow kɔ sor no
column4: nna wɔsaan hɔn ekyir bio bokunkum Ai mbarimba no."

column2: "Na kuw kor no so fiir edzi fii kurow no mu baa hɔn do; ma Aimba no kaa Israel ntamu
column3: binom wɔ afa ha
column4: na binom so wɔ afa ha: na wokunkum hɔn araa ma wɔamma hɔn mu biara annka anaa oemmfi nsa."

column2: "Na wɔkyeer Aihen no enyikan
column3: na wɔdze no brɛɛ Josua."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ aber a Israel wiee Aifo a wɔwɔ akoe mu
column3: wɔ sar no do mbrɛ wotsiiw hɔn no kunkum
column4: na hɔn nyinara totɔr wɔ afona anomu araa kodur dɛ hɔn ase kumii no
column6: na wɔdze afona anomu kɔbɔɔ no."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔtotɔr da no nyinara
column3: mbanyin nye mbaa nyina yɛ mpemduebien."

column2: "Na Josua anntwe ne nsa a ɔdze tseen peaa no annsan ekyir araa kodur dɛ ɔsɛɛ Aifo nyinara pasapasa."
"Kurow no mu fiembowa nye asadze nko na Israel faa no afonam maa hɔnho
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔdze hyɛɛ Josua no tse."

column2: "Nna Josua hyeew Ai
column3: na ɔyɛɛ no siw a ɔwɔ hɔ daa
column4: mekyerɛ amamfo

column2: "Na ɔdze Aihen no sɛɛn dua do araa ma okodur ewimbir: na wi kɔtɔree no Josua hyɛe ma wokeyii no fun no fii dua no do
column3: na wɔkɔtowee kyeen kurow no no kuropon ano na wɔhɔɔr abosiw kɛsenara wɔ do
column4: na ɔwɔ hɔ dze bodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Nna Josua sii afɔrmbukyia maa EWURADZE
column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column4: wɔ bepɔw Ebal do
column6: "dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Moses mbra nwoma no mu
column7: afɔrmbukyia a wɔdze abo a wonntwae a nyimpa biara mmaa dadze biara do wɔ do pɛn sii: na wɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ do maa EWURADZE

column2: "Na ɔkyerɛɛw Moses mbra no no nsusudo wɔ abo no do hɔ
column3: ɔno na ɔkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israelmba enyim no."

column2: "Na Israel nyinara
column3: nye hɔn mpanyimfo nye ahwɛdofo
column4: nye hɔn ntsɛmbuafo
column7: wɔ Levifo asɔfo a wɔso EWURADZE n'ahyɛmudaka no enyim
column8: ɔhɔho nye okuromnyi nyinara: hɔn mu fa wɔ bepɔw Gerizim enyim
column9: na hɔn mu fa so wɔ bepɔw Ebal enyim dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'akowaa Moses hyɛɛ dɛ wondzi kan nhyira Israel ɔman no ana no."

column2: "Na n'ekyir no ɔkenkaan mbra no mu nsɛm nyinara
column3: nhyira no nye mpaa no
column4: dɛ mbrɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no wɔ mbra nwoma no mu nyinara tse."

column2: "Asɛm biara nnyi dza Moses hyɛe no nyinara mu a Josua annkenkan no wɔ Israel bagua no nyinara
column3: nye mbaa
column4: nye mbofraba
column5: nye ahɔho a wɔnye hɔn nam no enyim."
